description: As a Technical Solutions Engineer, you will develop innovative solutions to help our Sales teams thrive, with an emphasis on making consumer support as efficient and effective as possible. You'll work with a variety of Googlers, all with different skills and specialties – from product managers to engineering teams.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • BA/BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field or equivalent practical experience.
  • Experience in one or more of the following: C, C++, Java, Python.
  • Experience working in a technical operations environment, solving technical software and/or hardware issues for clients/partners
  • Experience with web technologies such as HTML5, JavaScript, CSS, HTTP.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience with Internet of Things (IoT) technologies.
  • Deep understanding in one or more of the following areas: HTML5/JavaScript (MSE/EME), Java (Android), Objective-C (iOS), Web (Chrome, IE, Safari, FF), C# (Windows)
  • A quick learner and can ramp up quickly on new technologies and SDKs
  • Flexibility for travel and short-term co-location with partners
responsibilities:
• Bring excellent partner experiences to Home and the Google Cast ecosystem.
  • Take on initiatives including web applications, large, distributed systems and data mining, as well as projects that have a strong emphasis on building scalable server-side components.
  • Cultivate an in-depth understanding of Home automation partner use-cases and assist with associated implementations.
  • Define experiences that realize associated requirements, and build the necessary functionality working with key Google platforms and partner devices.
title: Technical Solutions Engineer, Consumer Hardware
